about_company:
Since 2010, IT-Development (ITD) has provided Mobile Network Operators (MNOs) and Towercos with an innovative end-to-end solution (ClickOnSite) to lower costs and efficiently manage tower sites, rollouts, assets lifecycle, and operations at scale. Everyone from the office to the field works on one data set, in real-time, on a PC, tablet, or mobile. We have 12,000 daily users across more than 24 countries. We count big names like MTN, Orange, TOTEM, Tele2, T-Mobile, Altice, and Asiacell,... among our clients, but we also bring the power of technology to smaller organizations.
With over 30 years of experience of our founders, in the telecoms industry and network deployments, ITD aims to be the #1 provider of software for managing telecom infrastructure sites and operations in Europe, Africa, the Middle East, SE Asia, and Latin America. Our seven offices are in France (HQ), Slovakia, The Netherlands, Ivory Coast, and Vietnam.
#MakeTheEverydayBetter summarizes our philosophy to keep ITD products easy to use

about_company:
There has been a significant transformation in the IT industry of Bangladesh in the past two decades. In a relatively short period of time, the country has emerged as one of the key software exporters in South Asia.

Bangladesh currently ranks 21st in IT outsourcing, business process outsourcing and software development (Source: The Global Location Service Index). However, its role in the International market has been mostly in the form of third-party developers, often developing digital technologies for offshore companies.

Since the inception of Appnap, our aim was to develop world-class native softwares and directly compete in the international market. Appnap has eventually established itself as one of the emerging software companies in the country and achieved ISO 9001:2015 certification accordingly. Inaugurated in 2017, the company continues to push its limits through cutting edge technology and top-notch products that are used by millions of people around the world.

The landscape of software development evolves at a lightning speed. But there is something that remains constant: our passion for creating the next generation products for our loyal users. We rely on our highly experienced team consisting of developers, designers, researchers, marketers and business analytics to deliver the absolute best user experience.

We wanted to redefine the typical nine to five working culture of the corporate world too. This is why we heavily focused on transforming our workplaces into cultural hubs, emphasizing more on the work environment and relationship with our colleagues. Abandoning the regular work culture was not easy, but it paid off pretty well in the end. We are stroked to be one of the best places to work for in the country.

    Yearly salary review
    Week-long annual retreat and Half-yearly team bonding trip
    Casual leave, Sick leave, Annual leave, and public holidays as gazetted by the government
    Leave encashment facility
    Loan facility with 0% EMI
    Medical Insurance

RANCON Motor Bikes Ltd. (RMBL), the only Manufacturer and country distributor of SUZUKI Motor Corporation – Japan for their world-renowned SUZUKI Motorcycles. RMBL is one of the most prominent ventures of the RANCON Group and a premier conglomerate of Bangladesh. 

The journey of RMBL commenced in the summer of 2012 with a team of only three. The first shipment of bikes was due to arrive in the following summer and was sold out months before arrival. Since then, just like in other countries around the globe, owning a Suzuki motorcycle in Bangladesh has become a privilege. Fast forward to 2018, with a team of 360, Suzuki Bangladesh has successfully started its own fully equipped Manufacturing Plant of over 140,000sft in Gazipur, Bangladesh. Since then, it has created a prominent footprint in the motorcycle industry of Bangladesh by being a Manufacturer of Motorcycles. Striving to implement the practical initiatives required for achieving its vision and guided by a relentless focus on values, the company maintains close relations with its foreign partners and also local stakeholders thereby guaranteeing high-quality motorbikes, with genuine parts and efficient after-sales service to their valued customers all over the country. 

RMBL believes in delivering operational excellence to meet commitments. Furthermore, with diversification and a variation of products, it has earned a prestigious reputation among everyone as the distributor of premium quality brands and services. We're confident that you'll see why now, more than ever, Suzuki is THE Way of Life for every motorcycle rider around the globe.

about_company:
Welcome to Review Dibo, the game-changer in the realm of online commerce. We provide a dynamic platform that seamlessly connects consumers and merchants, revolutionizing the way businesses thrive in the digital landscape.

For merchants, Review Dibo is the key to unlocking unparalleled insights into customer satisfaction. Our platform empowers merchants to build a robust online presence by inviting customers to share their experiences effortlessly. Through a user-friendly account system, merchants can input sales data and extend invitations to customers, ensuring a streamlined review process.

Consumers, on the other hand, gain access to a transparent and informative space where they can contribute to and benefit from a rich tapestry of authentic reviews. Review Dibo transcends individual transactions, creating a vibrant community where consumers can make informed decisions by exploring and engaging with reviews for a variety of merchants.

Beyond being a review platform, Review Dibo is a strategic ally for merchants. Our advanced analytics system provides actionable insights derived from customer feedback. Merchants receive tailored recommendations to enhance their offerings, improve customer satisfaction, and boost their overall ratings. Review Dibo transforms customer feedback into a powerful tool for merchants to make data-driven decisions and elevate their online reputation.

Join Review Dibo and be part of a revolutionary approach to online commerce. Whether you're a consumer seeking genuine insights or a merchant aiming to thrive in the digital marketplace, Review Dibo is the catalyst for success. Embrace the future of online business with a platform that values authenticity, transparency, and continuous improvement. Review Dibo - where consumer trust meets business growth.

about_company:
Rokomari.com is an e-commerce venture of “Onnorokom Group Web Services Ltd”, a sister concern of Onnorokom Group. The journey of Rokomari.com began on January 19, 2012, as an online book store. But after receiving humongous positive responses from our customers, we soon started selling CDs/DVDs, sports jerseys, stationery items, etc. In the near future, Rokomari.com will also start selling eBooks, mobile phones, computers and accessories, home appliances, apparel, gift items, directly imported goods, and many more.

Rokomari.com is the first ever online shopping portal in Bangladesh that has introduced some path-breaking services like “Cash On Delivery (COD)”, where customers can buy the product of their own choice first and pay for those after receiving them. By introducing this service Rokomari made a bond of trust with their customers immediately. We always believe that we don’t deliver parcels of books/products, we deliver “parcels of happiness”.
Rokomari.com is on a mission to drive Bangladesh’s most comprehensive virtual business that helps customers make informed choices and extract the best value for their money.

The company’s portfolio of services includes enterprise application integration and implementation, enterprise information technology (IT) solutions, offshore development service and technical support. It offers services in the area of custom application development, service-oriented architecture and mobile application development. With its comprehensive understanding of diverse business verticals and wide resources, Business Automation mobilizes the right people, skills, and technologies to help organizations enhance its performance and transform cost burdens into competitive business assets.

Vision:
To empower organizations for better customer experience using technology, process and people. Its goals also include being the first choice among customers and employees.

Mission:
Partnering with clients to master their challenges through people, services and solutions.

about_company:
'Arclite Systems Ltd.' is a game development company pioneering innovation in the mobile gaming industry. With a relentless passion for creativity and a steadfast commitment to excellence, we stand at the forefront of crafting immersive and entertaining experiences for modern mobile gamers.
Founded in 2010, Arclite Systems embarked on its journey as a mobile game development company for Symbian OS. Evolving with the industry, we transitioned to Android game development, pioneering the field and establishing ourselves as leaders in the gaming landscape today. 

Our Values:

Quality Excellence: We are dedicated to delivering top-tier mobile gaming experiences where quality is infused into every aspect, from mechanics to graphics and user interfaces.

Innovation: Embracing innovation as our driving force, we continually push the boundaries of mobile gaming, incorporating emerging technologies and novel gameplay concepts into our titles.

Diversity and Inclusion: We celebrate diversity in both our games and our team, understanding that varied perspectives lead to more creative and inclusive gaming experiences.

Continuous Improvement: Committed to self-improvement and constant growth, we analyze successes and failures to learn, adapt, and enhance our games and company as a whole.

Community Engagement: Recognizing our community as the heart of our success, we actively engage with our players, listen to their needs, and foster a sense of belonging within our gaming communities.

Global Perspective: Our games transcend borders and cultures, creating experiences that resonate with players worldwide, and respecting the cultural diversity of our global audience. 

Our games redefine boundaries, taking players on journeys of excitement and entertainment. Infused with intuitive controls and stunning graphics, we invite you to experience a world of strategy and fun. Welcome to Arclite Systems - where every game is an adventure!
